title: Homepage Animated Typing Effect
description: Verify that the animated typing effect in the hero section runs smoothly, cycles through all intended phrases, and does not cause performance issues.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage.
Observe that the animated typing effect begins automatically.
Confirm that all predefined textual phrases are displayed sequentially with typing and deleting animation.
Check that the animation loops continuously without freezing or lag.
Ensure no JavaScript errors or browser console errors are generated during animation.

title: Responsive Navigation Bar Functionality
description: Verify that the responsive navigation bar works correctly across devices with smooth scrolling to sections when clicked.

steps.description: Open the website on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
Verify the navigation bar adapts layout appropriately for each screen size.
Click each navigation link in the navbar.
Confirm that the page smoothly scrolls to the correct target section for each navigation item.
Verify no broken links or unexpected jumps occur during navigation.
On mobile, open and close the hamburger menu multiple times.
Ensure the menu opens and closes smoothly without layout glitches or freezing.

title: Skills Progress Bars Display and Animation
description: Check the skills progress bars accurately reflect skill levels and animate into view when the user scrolls to the Skills section.

steps.description: Navigate to the homepage and scroll down to the Skills section.
Confirm that each skill has an associated progress bar displayed.
Verify the lengths of progress bars correspond correctly with the stated proficiency levels.
Observe that the progress bars animate smoothly from zero to their respective levels upon scrolling into view.
Scroll up and down multiple times.
Check the animation triggers only on initial scroll into view and does not cause flickering or repetition issues.

title: Project Modal Open and Close Behavior
description: Verify that clicking on any project opens a modal with detailed project information and the modal can be closed properly.

steps.description: Scroll to the Projects section on the homepage.
Click on a project thumbnail or link.
Confirm that a modal window appears with detailed and relevant information about the selected project.
Verify the modal overlays the main content and prevents background interaction.
Close the modal using the close button or clicking outside the modal area.
Ensure the modal closes smoothly and returns the user to the original page view without content disruption.
Repeat the process with each project to verify all modals function correctly.

title: Experience Timeline Chronological Order Display
description: Ensure the experience timeline presents professional history and education in correct chronological order and is fully visible on all supported devices.

steps.description: Navigate to the Experience section.
Verify entries are sorted accurately from earliest to latest or as defined in the PRD.
Confirm that the timeline is fully visible and horizontally or vertically scrollable without clipping on all devices and screen orientations.
Resize browser and test on mobile devices.
Ensure layout and readability remain intact with no overlapping text or missing content.

title: Contact Information Accuracy and Link Functionality
description: Verify that all contact details are correct, clickable where appropriate, and social media icons redirect correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Contact section.
Check that all displayed contact information such as email, phone number, and address are accurate.
Click on email and phone links if present.
Confirm the appropriate email client or phone dialer opens.
Click each social media icon or link.
Verify each link redirects to the correct social media platform page in a new tab or window.
Ensure no broken links or 404 errors occur.

title: Website Responsiveness and Visual Layout Consistency
description: Verify that the entire website displays correctly and functions consistently on different browsers and major devices with varying screen sizes.

steps.description: Open the website using browsers such as Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge.
Check for visual consistency including fonts, colors, spacing, and alignment across browsers.
Test the website on devices including desktop monitors, tablets, and smartphones of various screen sizes.
Confirm that page layouts adapt appropriately without horizontal scrollbars or clipped content.
Ensure interactive elements are accessible and usable on touch screens.

title: Error Handling for Missing Project Data in Modal
description: Test how the project modal system behaves when project details are missing or incomplete.

steps.description: Simulate a scenario where a project entry lacks some or all detailed data.
Click on the affected project to open the modal.
Verify that the modal handles missing data gracefully by displaying default messages or placeholders.
Ensure no uncaught errors or broken UI elements appear.
Close the modal and verify normal site functionality resumes.

title: Navigation Bar Accessibility and Keyboard Navigation
description: Ensure the responsive navigation bar is accessible and can be fully navigated using keyboard inputs alone.

steps.description: Load the website homepage.
Use the keyboard Tab key to navigate through the navigation bar items.
Confirm the focus indicator is clearly visible on each navigation item.
Press Enter or Space to activate navigation links.
Verify that links correctly navigate or scroll to the target sections.
Test keyboard control of the mobile dropdown menu (hamburger icon).
Ensure keyboard users can open and close the menu and access links inside it.

title: Performance Under Heavy Scroll and Interaction
description: Verify the website performance remains smooth without lags or crashes during heavy scrolling and multiple interactions such as opening modals and navigating sections rapidly.

steps.description: Rapidly scroll up and down through all sections of the webpage multiple times.
Open and close different project modals multiple times in quick succession.
Switch between different sections using the navigation bar quickly.
Observe the website's responsiveness remains unaffected and animations continue smoothly.
Check browser's performance tools to confirm no excessive CPU or memory usage spikes.
